perturbation.changed_text:
BETWEEN
(1)  CHINA ECONOMIC INFORMATION SERVICE OF XINHUA NEWS AGENCY, the organisation
     within the Xinhua News Agency that is responsible for news and information
     operations and business, registered in the People's Republic of China with
     offices at 57 Xuanwumen Xidajie, Beijing, the People's Republic of China (
     "CEIS"); and
(2)  XINHUA FINANCIAL NETWORK LIMITED, a company incorporated in Hong Kong whose
     registered office is at Room 2003-4, Vicwood Plaza, 199 Des Voeux Road
     Central, Hong Kong ("XFN"),
     (collectively referred to as "ENTITIES"; individually, a "PARTY").
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'PARTIES' to 'ENTITIES' in the collective reference introduces ambiguity. While 'PARTY' is still defined for individual reference, it's unclear if 'ENTITIES' encompasses both CEIS and XFN under all circumstances, potentially causing confusion in clauses referring to collective obligations of the entities.

perturbation.original_text:
8.   TERMINATION
8.1  XFN may terminate this Agreement by giving thirty (30) days written notice
     to the CEIS.
8.2  Either Party may terminate this Agreement:
     (a)  if the other Party commits a material breach of this Agreement which
          is not capable of being remedied;
     (b)  if the other Party commits a material breach of this Agreement which
          is capable of being remedied but not remedied within thirty (30) days
          upon receiving written notice from the non-breaching party requiring
          remedy; and
     (c)  if the other Party becomes insolvent or bankrupt.
8.3  Upon termination of the Agreement:
     (a)  CEIS shall terminate the transmission of the Content with immediate
          effect; and
     (b)  in the event that this Agreement is terminated prior to the expiry of
          the Term, XFN shall recover any sums paid to CEIS in advance for the
          unexpired Term of this Agreement, together with interest from the date
          those sums were paid until the date of full refund.
perturbation.changed_text:
8.   TERMINATION
8.1  XFN may terminate this Agreement by giving thirty (30) days written notice
     to the CEIS.
8.2  Either Party may cancel this Agreement:
     (a)  if the other Party commits a significant infraction of this Agreement which
          is not capable of being remedied;
     (b)  if the other Party commits a serious infraction of this Agreement which
          is capable of being remedied but not remedied within thirty (30) days
          upon receiving written notice from the non-breaching party requiring
          remedy; and
     (c)  if the other Party becomes insolvent or bankrupt.
8.3  Upon termination of the Agreement:
     (a)  CEIS shall terminate the transmission of the Content with immediate
          effect; and
     (b)  in the event that this Agreement is terminated prior to the expiry of
          the Term, XFN shall recover any sums paid to CEIS in advance for the
          unexpired Term of this Agreement, together with interest from the date
          those sums were paid until the date of full refund.
perturbation.explanation: Using both 'terminate' and 'cancel' for the same concept (ending the agreement) creates confusion. Further, replacing 'material breach' with 'significant infraction' and 'serious infraction' introduces ambiguity as the definition of 'infraction' and its different levels are not provided, making it difficult to determine the grounds for cancellation versus termination.
